version_description:
Minimum iOS version has been increased from 6.0 to 6.1. Our next release will require a minimum of iOS 7.0.
Improved camera barcode scanning accuracy and speed.
Added a new settings screen for camera scanner to disable decoding of specific formats.
Fixed issue on specific environments where HEAD requests would fail when using GZIP encoding.
Updated framework to latest version for stability improvements and bug fixes.
Enabled local storage backups to fix issue with OS clearing databases when low on hard drive memory.
Added support for integration with PayPal HERE for credit card processing.
Added support for Socket Mobile hardware barcode scanners.

New features for Astea Mobile Universal 12.7 or above:
Multiple image selection for attachments

New features for Astea Mobile Edge 14.5 or above:
Audio attachment type
Sketch attachment type
Annotation of existing or new photo attachments

Video attachments can now be transcoded and compressed.
iOS 11 and iPhone X support has been added.
GPS now supports geofences.
Fixed issue with GPS timing in certain cases.
Fixed issue where app would constantly show Downloading screen.
Fixed various issues around iOS 11 and workarounds for occasional white screens.
Removed database limitations and fixed locking errors.
